dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_dict set dict_group_code = #{dictGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_code = #{dictCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dict_name = #{dictName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid = #{valid,jdbcType=CHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dict_desc = #{dictDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
from t_dict where dict_group_code = #{dictGroupCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND valid = 'Y' ORDER BY seq
